name: gpio_button_led
description: GPIO power button and LED control for Volumio 4
author: Just a Nerd

volumio_info.details: Power button with LED indicator via GPIO. Mimics Audiophonics on/off behavior without MCU. Button triggers shutdown when running. For wake-from-halt, GPIO3 with diode circuit required (see README).
volumio_info.changelog: 1.0.0: Initial release - kernel gpio-shutdown overlay, dual-pin LED with software blink, configurable polarity
